publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-06 18:53:14 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.abstract: This collection contains commencement guides, programs, speeches, invitations, audiovisual materials, and a capture of the 2020 Commencement website made especially to document the University response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection consists of 1 series: Unprocessed Accessions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains commencement guides, programs, speeches, invitations, audiovisual materials, and a capture of the 2020 Commencement website made especially to document the University response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.
This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

did.unittitle: Commencement programs, guides, invitations and news articles

physdesc.extent: WARC file contains captured of each school's 2020 commencement ceremony, excluding the well-wishing videos submitted by friends, family, faculty, and staff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This web capture represents the commencement ceremonies for each school at Tufts as they were held online in 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The capture does not include the well-wisher videos submitted by family, friends, faculty, and staff to each school.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Webrecorder Player is needed to playback the website content. Instuctions for download and use are in the Box folder linked from this record.
